thread.title: People reveal which “double-standard” irritates them the most? (15 Photos)
thread.title_full: People reveal which “double-standard” irritates them the most? (15 Photos)

author: Sebastian
title: People reveal which “double-standard” irritates them the most? (15 Photos)
text:
6 GIF 
“As a teacher, there are times I would love to be able to put an arm around a student who is crying, or have a student come back to my room for extra help if they are struggling, but I’m male…..so that can’t happen. We are literally told by our administration never to do any of that if we are male.” 7
